function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear source and intermediate hosts of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread of the disease and identifying potential transmission pathways","Mitigation":"Intensified research and surveillance to identify the source and intermediate hosts, enhanced monitoring of potential transmission pathways","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, surveillance systems, diagnostic tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Disease transmission from person-to-person","Impact":"Rapid spread of the disease in communities and workplace settings","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict infection control measures, promotion of social distancing, use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air filtration systems, PPE manufacturing","People":"General population, healthcare workers, employers","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic carriers as potential source of virus spread","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission between humans due to undetected cases","Mitigation":"Rigorous testing and monitoring for asymptomatic carriers, public health education on preventive measures for asymptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, public health education platforms","People":"General population, healthcare workers, asymptomatic individuals","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, healthcare providers"}]}
